column4: local transfers on my wrt54g are more like 8mbps isntead of 54mbps
how do I fix that?
no
it's the slow file transfer that is telling me that it's less
which terms would those be?
that is the difference between 54 Mbits/sec and 8Mbytes/sec
I'm getting about 1MB/sec (10mbps)
yes
I realize that
which is why I expected I would be transferring faster than 8mbps
no...
I get more like 1 mega BYTES
when I should be getting 8
someone mentioned that since I'm using it as a gateway for WAN that it's limited to the bus speed of 10mbps
do I need to bridge two WRT54Gs together in WDS to get 54mbps on LAN?
yes
because virtualgirl is naughty
I'm using my dsl router as a gateway of course, but I get about 10-11MBytes/sec inside my LAN
it happens with Samba transfers as well... I think it's because I'm using my WRT54g as a WAN gateway
it is using WEP... but will it really make the difference between 8mbps and 54mbps?
ok
my apologies. those are my transfer speeds using cat-5. Over wifi, it does pretty much stink.
